#  The Conservation of Arctic Fauna and Flora (CAFF)

We are going to the North and utilize data from the The Conservation of Arctic Fauna and Flora in short [CAFF](http://http://www.caff.is/). They provide a lot of interesting data for the northern hemisphere [CAFF Geoserver](http://dev.caff.is:8080/geoserver/web/).

We take the sea surface and the land surface temperature what may interest in correspondence to the roads of Greenland.




```{r caff,  warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=9.47,cache=FALSE}

rm(list = ls())
library(mapview)
library(raster)

### load Greenlands roads data from geofabrik
data("roadsGRL")

 # load the list of the above example
 data("map.types")

### map the CAFF data
mapview::projView(roadsGRL, map.types = map.types$CAFF)
```
